title: Experience of a Lifetime With Grand Canyon Flights
text:
Experience of a Lifetime With Grand Canyon Flights   grand canyon flights 
Traveling to the desert southwest region of the United States is an incredible experience. Visitors will be able to take in some truly amazing sights. At the top of most people’s wish list is a trip to the Grand Canyon. This massive rift was created millions of years ago and provides one of the best ways to observe the ancient landscape of the North American continent. 
There are a number of ways to view this awe inspiring sight. However, for anyone who wants an unforgettable experience Grand Canyon flights are the way to go. Visitors can choose from either a air plane or helicopter flight and both will offer a fantastic time. There are two popular local airports to choose from, the South Rim site or the much bigger Las Vegas airport. For anyone staying in the city it is very convenient to book a flight and add this incredible experience to their vacation package. 
When planning any vacation it is very important to do some homework. Anyone thinking of adding a flight to their itinerary should take the time to research several companies to see which one gets the best reviews. Many visitors today take a few minuets to post their opinions on travel sites. This is one of the best and fastest ways to find out which tour company has the most satisfied clients. 
In order to get the most out of their flight visitors should also learn about the geology and geography of the Canyon. This will help them understand what they are looking at. They will be viewing one of the world’s most amazing geological sites and should have some basic knowledge of terminology. 
The weather is also a major factor to take into consideration when planning a flight. Many people are surprised to learn that the temperatures can vary dramatically throughout the region. This has a lot to do with elevation. The highest elevations do see quite a lot of snow in the winter months. However, during the height of the summer the heat can be over whelming. 
Those with any medical conditions or small children in their party may find the sheer physical challenge of the Canyon too much. This is when a sight seeing fight is a much better option. Flights are the perfect way for everyone to see the layer upon layer of rock that have been exposed by millions of years of erosion by the Colorado River. It is important to note that due to safety reasons planes are not allowed to fly within 1,500 feet of the rim. 
One of the biggest decisions is which to choose, helicopter or plane. The helicopter rides are very popular as they can land much closer to the site. In fact, flights take off and land at the nearby Hulapai Indian Reservation. This makes them by far the most convenient option for those at the Canyon site. 
Some of the most spectacular flights are those that take off at sunrise or sunset. As the intensity of the sunlight hits the Canyon walls a profoundly magical effect takes place. It is at this moment that visitors realize they are experiencing one of the true wonders of the world.
